solution_line_template: So, Matt is {jed_present_age} - {jed_older_than_matt} = <<{jed_present_age}-{jed_older_than_matt}={matt_present_age}>>{matt_present_age} years old now.
Thus, the sum of their present ages is {jed_present_age} + {matt_present_age} = <<{jed_present_age}+{matt_present_age}={sum_ages}>>{sum_ages}.
